ygData.subject: RE: Starting a New Cleric Suggestions Please
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree with Mr. I Don t Need a Shrink to Tell Me What to Think  in that you should either be an evil Cleric (Dark Elf) or a humanoid cleric.
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree with Mr. "I Don't Need a Shrink to Tell Me What to Think
" in that you should either be an evil Cleric (Dark Elf) or a humanoid
cleric. Dwarves probably have the best stats for a cleric, but being a
dwarf on the racewar server will be a hard road, because you are teamed
with the gnomes and halflings. Poor bastards.

As for what humanoid race to pick, it TOTALLY depends on your
personality. Are you happy with sitting back and healing (Erudite) like
a pure cleric, or would you rather tank a bit and smash some face
(human), a fighting cleric. Your choice.

Baelstorm

> -----Original Message-----
> From: I Don't Need a Shrink to Tell Me What to Think
> [SMTP:douglas@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 4:03 PM
> To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Starting a New Cleric Suggestions
> Please
>
> From: "I Don't Need a Shrink to Tell Me What to Think"
> <douglas@...>
>
> On Wed, 14 Jul 1999, Chas Watkins wrote:
>
> > The Erudite has more Wisdom
> >
> > Str Sta Ag Dx W Int Ch
> > 65 75 70 70 93 105 70 +30
>
> Bah! More numbers games! Jeez.
>
> Go with the Erudite. Dump 20 points into strength, 10 into Wisdom.
> You
> can raise your wisdom later. THe high INT will help with skills.
>
> Why Erudite? Because they look cooler and because everyone on the
> racewar server will be playing evil races and humanhumans.
>
>
> --
> We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
> with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
> of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
>
>
